LanguageData.ZP_aRice.label: Alpha Rice
LanguageData.ZP_aRice.description: 【特産品】Emergency food. By drying out the rice, this meal deteriorates much slower than "proper" dishes. Preparing rice in almost any other way will bring out its delicious quality.
LanguageData.ZP_Hardtack.label: Hardtack
LanguageData.ZP_Hardtack.description: 【特産品】Emergency food. A type of biscuit that's baked for long term preservation. The word "tack" was used by British sailors as slang for "food." Historically, hardtack has been used as a stand in for perishable foods, such as during ocean voyages and military campaigns.
LanguageData.ZP_Timaki.label: Chimaki
LanguageData.ZP_Timaki.description: 【特産品】Emergency food. Glutinous rice wrapped in plant leaves. Preservation is increased by simmering the rice in lye beforehand.
